recipe.title: Brocolli Salad
recipe.ingredients:
1 head of bricolli 1/2 red onion Juice from one lemon 1 rind of bacon cut finely 35g Almond slivers
1 teaspoon of mayonnaise 1 Tablespoon of yogurt
recipe.steps: Cut bricolli up and drop in boiling water 2 mins Strain and cool Chop red onion finely and soak in lemon juice Roast almond and fry bacon Combine Make drawing with mayo and yogurt Mix with dressing
